channel.title: Need help making 317 Revival-rs server
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I'm having trouble attempting to create a 317 server from the Revival-rs source. I don't really have any experience with java or coding but my friends and I really wanted to relive old memories of the 2006 era. I tried searching for tutorials on creating 317 servers and all of the sources in the tutorials had compilers for both the server and the client, but the Revival-rs source doesn't have a compiler. The original page seems dead now so I decided to ask here. If someone was kind enough to compile, or at least help me to compile and create this server my friends and I would be very grateful.
The Revival-rs thread says that it uses the 2006memorys client to run, and I'm not sure how it could be linked to the Revival-rs server to run.
Thanks in advance :)
[b]Links to the topics: [/b]
Revival-rs - [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=659091.0]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=659091.0[/url]
2006memorys - [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/485570-2006scape-advanced-2006memorys.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/485570-2006scape-advanced-2006memorys.html[/url]

item.title: Need help making 317 Revival-rs server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

100 errors usually refers to a missing brace { or }
The best solution would be to load the source into a IDE (You don’t need a compiler batch script if you use an IDE, as they auto compile when you run it in the environment). The IDE should be able to pinpoint your error.
I suggest Eclipse or Netbeans but everyone has a preference.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making 317 Revival-rs server
item.dc:creator: @I_like_swamp I like swamp
item.description:
@I_like_swamp wrote:

Thanks for helping,
I used the batch file generator, and removed all the “*.java” does not exist errors, then ran the compiler again
This time it gave me:

symbol: class _______
location: package ______ error: cannot find symbol _______

symbol: class Position
location: class Misc
100 errors

any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making 317 Revival-rs server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If the didn’t come with a compiler. I wrote this batch file generator for that specific reason. Though it doesn’t check if the directory doesn’t contain files which will cause errors when compiling. BUT, that’s as easy as removing the bit of code that the error says like:
“src/source/files/.java" does not exist
You’d edit the .bat and remove the section "src/source/files/.java” real easy.

Read full topic
